content: are you looking for a beginner crochet baby blanket pattern that s quick and easy to make this gorgeous chunky cosy blanket not only looks great but also can be made in as little as three hours it is a great project for a crochet newbie and also for experienced crocheters looking for a quick enjoyable make full free written pattern and tutorials for left and right handed can be found at https //blog bellacococrochet com/easy-and-fast-free-crochet-baby-blanket-pattern/ difficulty beginner pattern is written in uk terms colour changes will be made on the last stitch of the previous row gauge 9 sts x 5 row 4 inch x 4 inch using half treble_crochet completed size 25 inch w x 29 inch h approx crochet skills needed chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch half_double_crochet s - half treble_crochet s
